channel.title: How do you change the rate you level up at? (combat)
channel.description: I get 850 xp per damage when i hit a monster, Does anyone know how i can change it to like 100? I already looked for 850* and *850 in client java and play handler but i cant find anything, HELP PLEASE!

item.description:
@caponescape wrote:

there a whole bunch of add skill xp and no i didnt find the one for atackâ€¦

item.title: How do you change the rate you level up at? (combat)

item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Open client.java, and look for addskillxp you will find the XP
